com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.cluster.clustering.algo

Interface Algorithm<T extends ClusterItem>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GridBasedAlgorithm, NonHierarchicalDistanceBasedAlgorithm, PreCachingAlgorithmDecorator

    public interface Algorithm<T extends ClusterItem>
    Logic for computing clusters

    Inspired by https://github.com/googlemaps/android-maps-utils.

      • setMaxDistanceBetweenClusteredItems

        void setMaxDistanceBetweenClusteredItems(int maxDistance)
        Sets the biggest distance allowed between two markers before they get clustered. By default this value is 100.
        Parameters:
        maxDistance - the max distance between markers before they get clustered

        Returns:
        the max distance between markers before they get clustered
